thread.title: Homeland Security Head Said He Doesn't 'Have A Clue' What The Definition Of A Sanctuary City Is
thread.title_full: Homeland Security Head Said He Doesn't 'Have A Clue' What The Definition Of A Sanctuary City Is

author: ELLIOT SPAGAT
title: Homeland Security Head Said He Doesn't 'Have A Clue' What The Definition Of A Sanctuary City Is
text:
SAN DIEGO (AP) — U.S. Homeland Security Secretary John Kelly told law enforcement officials on a tour of nation's border with Mexico Friday that he couldn't define a sanctuary city, which President Donald Trump has targeted for withdrawal of federal funding for refusing to cooperate with immigration authorities.

Read More →
